general.description: Entry into Shoden space is always guarded by armed stations. This is no exception, even if the nearby Core League worlds, Ziffel and Banthory, are not much of a threat. The station doubles up, as many border stations, as a small trade platform, dealing with raid bounty as well as legal commerce.
general.bar: The mess is filled by proud Shoden pilots ready to scramble and a few mean-looking sshaad merchants, looking down on an occasional human visitor
